Text.Page:
I'm sure you know that even a non-hungry Basilisk can still kill you on the spot if it has to. And yes, many people weren't able to escape from such tragic fates.

I am actually here for those people. To make an elixir that raises the dead! The Basilisk eyes will be useful to make the elixir.

Please bring some {@LinkCreature:3#300811#Basilisks}' eyes. Basilisks have many eyes, but I only need eyes that are not damaged.

Intriguing. I've never seen one this close without a giant people-eating creature behind it.

I'll continue my research. If it's successful, perhaps I'll name it after you!
I'm sorry, <PCNAME>. An intact, undamaged basilisk eye is what I need. Nothing less will do.
